about_the_game:
Painters Guild Soundtrack by the Swiss composer Morvan. Inspired by the Renaissance, this soundtrack features amazing choirs, harpsichords and more in high quality. All songs were exclusively composed for the game.

Tracklist:

1. Morvan - Painters Guild Theme (1:14)
2. Morvan - Arpa Adagio (1:48)
3. Morvan - Agnus dei kyrie eleison (4:23)
4. Morvan - San Marco (4:30)
5. Morvan - L'Organo del Duomo (1:42)
6. Morvan - Am Hofe (1:23)
7. Morvan - Angels & Demons (3:06)
8. Morvan - Voce di Venezia (2:37)
9. Morvan - Jeu d'orgue (1:54)
10. Morvan - Giardini Vaticani (1:44)
11. Morvan - Avant Garde Suite (2:37)
12. Morvan - Flötenkonzert (3:32)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
